name: TANGO (midisaurus)
description:
Goal: Combine letters to spell one of the target words above. How to Play:
  • Click/tap the tiles and drag them up/down/left/right to combine them with neighboring tiles in that direction. 
  • Score points by creating all the letters in one of the target words above.
  • Green indicates that the letter is included somewhere in the target words above.
  • Letter position does not matter.
  • Click "RESET" retry the same puzzle.
  • Click "#" to show letter values on each tile.
  • Click "?" to show the game rules.
